verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:25
verses.text: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:26
verses.text: And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:27
verses.text: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:28
verses.text: And they dwelt at Beer–sheba, and Moladah, and Hazar–shual,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:29
verses.text: And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:30
verses.text: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:31
verses.text: And at Beth–marcaboth, and Hazar–susim, and at Beth–birei, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.
